JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: System Manager for Manufacturing and Automation Systems, Hillerød, Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to be part of the team that drives digital transformation in FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies Denmark? Are you motivated by being part in a fast-growing department, passionate about IT and innovation? Would you like to be part of an international and diverse team that collaborates closely with each other? The position is based in Hillerød, Denmark, but we are mindful of everyone’s needs and we are in the process of implementing innovative ways of working together.

 

We are looking for a colleague to join the Application Management team. You will be responsible for Fluxa, Serialization and Data integrity (EDIS) Platforms and Services. You will be surrounded by highly dedicated and skilled colleagues that ensure stable, compliant, and relevant IT solutions that are utilized in the biotech and pharmaceutical industry. Simplicity and agility are important in everything we do.

About the role

Fluxa

As application manager for Fluxa, you will be part of a powerful drive to increase flexibility towards customers, remove paperwork and improve our procedures. All this with the end goal to introduce a “no-touch release” of our batches, which means that the batch will be shipped to the customer without any further processing and with increased efficiency.

Serialization

Joining the fight against falsified medicine, you will be responsible for FUJIFILM's Diosynth Biotechnologies Denmark serialization capabilities. You will ensure that package “fingerprinting” functionality remains complete and adheres to shifting markets, oversee changes and expanding on its use on site and potentially globally.

Data Integrity (EDIS)

You will be managing the system that provides the data for the engineering/quality team and ensure adherence to regulatory requirements as an essential part of our GxP Production. You will be part of the team that maintains and manages the adoption of the system across FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies.

Main Responsibilities: 

  • Maintain and develop the serialization platform in FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies Denmark at the levels 3 and 4
  • Manage and drive updates of our Fluxa system
  • Drive adoption of the data integrity (EDIS) platform globally
  • Handling the support and transition to other delivery teams throughout projects
  • Communicate and understand business needs and help translate these to the technical team
  • Producing documentation concerning processes and procedures

Your qualifications (Required)

  • Experience with application management in IT
  • Experience with GxP
  • Fully proficient in both written and spoken English
  • Willingness to learn new things
  • Good communication skills
  • Strong analytic skills by being able to break down complex tasks into process improvement solutions
  • High sense of responsibility

Your qualifications (Nice to have)

  • Experience with Serialization/Tracelink
  • Knowledge of Data Integrity standards in a GxP environment

Your Application

 

Please upload your CV and cover letter as soon as possible:

https://fujifilmdiosynth.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/External/details/System-Manager-for-Manufacturing-and-Automation-Systems_JR1221

For more information about this role please contact Head of Application Management, Paulius Pakalniskis on +45 50537019.

 

About FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies

FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies is an industry-leading Biologics Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization (CDMO) with locations in Hillerød, Denmark, Teesside, UK, RTP, North Carolina and College Station, Texas, USA. We use our skills, dedication and ambition to enable impact for the world’s most innovative biotech and biopharma companies reimagining healthcare’s potential. We work across the entire lifecycle of our customers’ products – enabling success throughout. Every cure, vaccine, biologic, and advancement we contribute to starts with our people and our passion. We fuel one another’s passion, help accelerate progress, expand capabilities, strengthen innovation, and improve processes to improve lives.

Our site in Hillerød, Denmark, brings together expertise, capabilities and technologies to manufacture advanced biologics. The large scale manufacturing facility has a capacity of 120,000 liters to reliably manufacture biologics for late phase and commercial use. We commenced 6 billion DKK projects to double our manufacturing capacity and to add fill finish to the site.

We offer the chance to be part of a global workplace where passion, drive and commitment are met with opportunities for professional and personal development. Deeply committed to diversity and inclusion, we ensure that everyone no matter their background or gender has an opportunity to develop. We take pride in enriching our communities, caring for our environment, and cultivating a world of opportunity for future generations.

We aim to foster a collaborative, innovative and rewarding environment, where diverse perspectives and people come together united by a common purpose and shared values. We pursue our fullest potential as individual contributors and team members. We strive to be the employer of choice and offer a competitive compensation and benefit package.

As we continue to enhance and expand our capabilities, we are looking for people who share our passion, drive, and energy – what we call Genki – to join our team.

www.fujifilmdiosynth.com
